alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 3:29PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 345 PM EST... At 329 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Delancy, or near Salt Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, East Palatka, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, San Mateo, Satsuma and Welaka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
